title: Amy Confesses To Liking Something She Once Hated + Eddie Shares Important Foster Kids Update + Bobby Gets Something For The First Time
itunes:title: Amy Confesses To Liking Something She Once Hated + Eddie Shares Important Foster Kids Update + Bobby Gets Something For The First Time
description:
Amy confesses to now liking something that she was once super against. Eddie shares an update on where his family is in the process of adopting their foster kids. Plus, Bobby talks about his experience getting something for the first time in order to shoot his TV show!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
